data.name: My Last Journey
data.detailed_description:
My Last Journey is an interactive story being developed by a large team of one person.
IInspired by old drawings, films and music of the late 90s and early 00s, an unusual world was created, saturated with melancholy and depression.
Careless brush strokes, and a complete lack of skills in this craft gave rise to a unique visual style, combined with a deep plot, dynamic gameplay and a soulful soundtrack, you will get a story that will probably remain in your memory for a long time.

However, this is not the time to give in to emotions, you, in the role of a poor guy who just miraculously survived a plane crash, must find the strength to survive and not freeze in this eternal blizzard.You have to survive, adapting to the harsh conditions here, and of course do not lose vigilance, danger lurks everywhere.
Use your wits to solve all kinds of puzzles, and fight for your life in all ways.
Find the rest of the survivors, unravel the mysteries of this place and find answers to the questions that torment your soul.

Features:
-A lively and elaborated world, made in an unusual graphic style.
-An interesting setting, the expanses of the wild Altai , with a touch of Old Russian myths and legends
-A deep story in which everyone will find an echo of something close and familiar
-An atmospheric soundtrack that dynamically conveys the mood of each location
-Elements of a puzzle platformer, woven with classical quest.

data.short_description: We all fall once...And now that day has come,when we were down,too.You have to go on an unforgettable adventure,which change you forever.Your fate depends on your decisions, will be you able to survive,or this journey will be your last...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 2660) or equivalent / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+ (2 2600) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600 Series
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
